description:
Tree works in rear garden subject to Highview No.1 TPO 1977.  Works: 

 Sycamores (T16 and T17):  Crown lift six metres, deadwood. 

 Chestnut (T19):  Remove lowest branch over drive and deadwood. 

 Holly (T20):  Crown reduce two branches over adjacent garden. 

 Large Plane (T18):  Deadwood,and remove broken limb. 

 Lime (T15):  Crown lift six metres, clear lamp to 1.2 metres, deadwood. 

 Plane (T12):  Cut back large overhanging branch, deadwood. 

 Sycamore (T13):  Crown lift over garage four metres. 

 Ash (T22):  Crown thin 30%, deadwood. 

 Poplar (T23):  Deadwood and inspect.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
